column1: #text=I was out of food so I went to my local market .
#text=I parked the car and walked to the door .
#text=I grabbed a cart on the way .
#text=Once inside i vowed to stick to the outside edges of the store , away from processed foods .
#text=I bought all my produce and some fresh baked bread .
#text=I also got milk and eggs and cheese .
#text=I caved and bought some tortilla chips because I had a mean craving for nachos .
#text=I also checked the frozen aisle for cheese taquitos .
#text=I found cheese taquitos once , years ago , but had never seen them again .
#text=I always check in vain , hoping one day to see them next to the chicken taquitos .
#text=After I had all my goods I went to the check out line .
#text=I made small talk with the cashier after I loaded my items on the the conveyor belt .
#text=I paid after everything was bagged in my cart .
